DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy intravenous ibuprofen compare ketorolac treatment postoperative pain measure patient pain intensity ( Visual Analog Scale , VAS )
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Intravenous Ibuprofen Compared Intravenous Ketorolac Pain Control Following Arthroscopic Knee Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule knee arthroscopy Inadequate IV access . History allergy hypersensitivity component ibuprofen , ketorolac , aspirin ( aspirin relate product ) , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) , opioids cyclooxygenase2 ( COX2 ) inhibitor . Less 18 year age . Use analgesic le 8 hour prior surgery . Patients active , clinically significant anemia . History evidence asthma heart failure . Pregnant . Recent history chronic opioid use . Concomitant use probenecid . Inability understand requirement study , willing provide write informed consent ( evidenced signature inform consent document approve Institutional Review Board [ IRB ] ) , agree abide study restriction return required assessment . Refusal provide write authorization use disclosure protect health information .
